# Neuralift

**Elevate your cognitive performance with scientifically-backed dual n-back training.**

[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/placeholder/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/neuralift/deploys)

## Overview

Neuralift is a modern, progressive web application for dual n-back cognitive training. Built with cutting-edge web technologies, it offers a premium training experience with offline-first architecture and optional cloud sync.

### Key Features

- **Dual N-Back Training** - Position and audio memory challenges
- **Progressive Difficulty** - 6 levels from 1-back to 3-back dual mode
- **Offline-First** - Works without internet using IndexedDB
- **Cloud Sync** - Optional Supabase integration for cross-device progress
- **AI Coach** - Personalized feedback powered by Claude AI
- **Accessibility** - WCAG compliant with full keyboard navigation
- **Dark Theme** - Beautiful neural-inspired design system

## Tech Stack

| Category | Technology |
|----------|------------|
| Framework | Next.js 16 (App Router) |
| UI | React 19, Tailwind CSS v4 |
| State | Zustand |
| Database | Dexie.js (IndexedDB), Supabase |
| Animation | Framer Motion |
| Audio | Howler.js |
| Testing | Playwright, Vitest |
| Deployment | Netlify |

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/cr-nattress/neuralift.git
cd neuralift

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev
```

Visit `http://localhost:3000` to start training.
